title._content: [Unidentified soldier in Confederate captain's uniform, red sash, and kepi marked V.V.]  (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified soldier in Confederate captain's uniform, red sash, and kepi marked V.V.] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : quarter-plate ambrotype, hand-colored ; 12.5 x 10.2 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff.
